abstract: Federal Aviation Administration will fine United Airlines $1.3 million for violation of rules related to shipment of hazardous materials; found 120 violations in 2013 that were largely related to inaccurate cargo descriptions.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Aviation Administration seeks to fine United Airlines $1.3 million for violating rules about shipping hazardous material.
snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration seeks to fine United Airlines $1.3 million for violating rules about shipping hazardous material.

headline.main: Regulators Seek Fine Against United Airlines
headline.print_headline: Regulators Seek Fine Against United Airlines
